patthana15.33:1.1: Sāsavaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanāsavo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anāsavaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanāsavo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
patthana15.33:2.1: Sāsavaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanāsavo naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana15.33:3.1: Sāsavaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nasāsavo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
